Mr. Speaker, I rise in support of H.R. 1098 to reauthorize the Junior  Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Act of 1994, sponsored by  Representative Scholten from Michigan.

Participants in the Junior Duck Stamp program take part in a  waterfowl-themed art competition, and the winning artwork is  transformed into collectible stamps.…
